product_name: Baffin Nicole Winter Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Walk the dog or brave your cold-weather commute in the Baffin Nicole winter shoes. Warm, waterproof uppers offer protection while easy, slip-on style allows quick entry and exit. Waterproof suede leather uppers provide protection from wet weather; polyester linings aid moisture management and feel soft against skin. Polyester insulation provides reliable warmth in freezing temperatures. Molded EVA midsoles supply all-day support and cushioning. Baffin Nicole winter shoes feature rugged rubber outsoles that deliver great traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Walk the dog or brave your cold-weather commute in the Baffin Nicole winter shoes. Warm, waterproof uppers offer protection while easy, slip-on style allows quick entry and exit.
